name: Slime
desc: A gelatinous, amorphous creature that prey on other living organisms.

name: Goblin
desc: Small, black-hearted, selfish humanoid like creature that loathes humans and will stop at nothing to trap them inside its lair.

name: Ghoul
desc: An undead creature that had a curse placed on them when they were human. They feed on corpses or living flesh.

name: Bone Colossus
desc: Large and aggressive golem-like undead creatures made from bones of various origins.

name: Xenomorph Shark
desc: A large carnivorous aquatic species that possess an inner jaw and body much like a Xenomorph alien.

name: Garland
desc: A once proud and arrogant knight that has been pushed with a curse bounding him to this labyrinth.
